attributes.action: Reintroduce the rule that heavy goods vehicles are confined to the inner lane on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Ministry for Transport decided in its wisdom to allow lorries to use all lanes other than the outermost on motorways.  This has created a situation where a five lane motorway is frequently reduced to a single lane by a moving road block of lorries occupying all but one lane.  This has introduced a serious hazard that has increased the number of accidents on what should be the safest of roadways.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on the restriction of HGVs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=hgv
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
